file_content.text: Your destiny is set. May the Force serve you.
There are two paths open to you--that of the Sith Assassin or the Sith Sorcerer.
An Assassin wields a double-bladed lightsaber and is a master of stealth, deception, and cunning. Lightning flows through the blade for damage and Darkness for defense.
A Sorcerer destroys enemies from a distance, focusing on mastery of the Force. They can fully control the destructive power of lighting, cripple foes and even restore allies.
The choice is yours, but know this--once made, it cannot be unmade. Your destiny will be decided.
I will become a Sith Assassin.
The choice is made. You are now a Sith Assassin.
I will become a Sith Sorcerer.
The choice is made. You are now a Sith Sorcerer.
